title: Accountant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Pioneer (Phoenix, AZ) in Jun 2017
Interview Descriptions: I was well prepared before the interview.  I read about the company's stories, make sure I know the direction.   called to find the names of the  interviewers. I came early to the interview

title: Faculty Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Pioneer in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Very bad process just selected on based of demo lecture .if you want to work without sallery please go their. They will ask very basic question of subject and they will hire you.ex for physics they asked why we slip during rainy days ? Why we use wollen cloth in cold etc

title: Auxiliar De Produção Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Pioneer (Manaus, Amazonas) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Rápida, a entrevistadora pega uma placa e mostra, apontando em alguns lugares e pergunta se conseguimos ver com nitidez os componentes que são bem pequenos. Mais antes disso tem uma prova objetiva bem fácil de português e matemática, com operações simples.

title: Inventory Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Pioneer (South Seattle, WA) in Oct 2012
Interview Descriptions: I never had an interview for my job or the resulting position that I had, they just hired me on the spot and stuck me at a desk and never helped me
